TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MajorUnit extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Drawing.Charts.AxisUnitType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 or above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is c:majorUnit.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **majorUnit (Major Unit)** This element specifies the distance between major ticks. |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |dateAx (§21.2.2.39); valAx (§21.2.2.226)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |val (Major Unit Value)|Specifies the contents of this attribute contain a positive floating point number.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_AxisUnit* simple type (§21.2.3.1).| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_AxisUnit) is located in §A.5.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MajorUnit class.

Docs.param: true to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; false to clone only the node itself.
